discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Uramenyeshwa iyo hagize ugira icyo avuga kuri iki kiganiro. Ushobora guhitamo guhindura ibyo umenyeshwa uko ubishaka.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:Ibiganirirwaho-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Talk pages]] niho abantu baganirira uburyo bwo gushyiraho ibiganirwaho {{SITENAME}} the best that it can be. You can use this page to start a discussion with others about how to improve [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: abantu kuri {{Izina ry'urubuga}} wakoresha uru [[{{MediaWiki:Ibiganirirwaho-emptystate-link-userpage}}|talk page]] kohereza ubutumwa Rusange kuri wowe kandi urabimenyeshwa iyo babikoze
